trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever this creature attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature. That creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当此生物攻击时，将目标生物上的+1/+1指示物数量加倍。该生物本回合不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·2 | Brimaz, Blight of Oreskos | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a Phyrexian creature or artifact creature spell, incubate X, where X is that spell's mana value. (Create an Incubator token with X +1/+1 counters on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非瑞人生物或神器生物咒语时，抚育X，X为该咒语的法术力值。（派出一个上面有X个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{2}：转化此神器。」它转化为0/0非瑞人神器生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·2 | Brimaz, Blight of Oreskos | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if a Phyrexian died under your control this turn, proliferate.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有非瑞人在你的操控下死去，则增殖。

If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

Then you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost if it's a spell with mana value less than the number of artifacts you control. If you don't cast it this way, you may cast it this turn.

trans-unit.resname: MOC·23 | Path of the Enigma | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws four cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓四张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·23 | Path of the Enigma | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Will of the Planeswalkers — Starting with you, each player votes for planeswalk or chaos. If planeswalk gets more votes, planeswalk. If chaos gets more votes or the vote is tied, chaos ensues.
trans-unit.target: 鹏洛客议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「时空换境」或「混沌」。若时空换境票数较多，则时空换境。若混沌票数较多或两者同为最多，则引发混沌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·23 | Path of the Enigma | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We were caught unprepared once. I won't let it happen again.
trans-unit.target: 「我们曾毫无防备仓促应战。我绝不会让此事重现。」

trans-unit.resname: MOC·24 | Schema Thief | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Schema Thief
trans-unit.target: 图纸窃贼

trans-unit.resname: MOC·24 | Schema Thief | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MOC·24 | Schema Thief | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Schema Thief deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of target artifact that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当图纸窃贼对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由该牌手操控之神器的复制品。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·24 | Schema Thief | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "An intriguing design, but it would be much better without all that oil."
trans-unit.target: 「设计确实令人眼前一亮，但要是没有那油就更好了。」

trans-unit.resname: MOC·25 | Blight Titan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blight Titan
trans-unit.target: 枯萎泰坦

trans-unit.resname: MOC·25 | Blight Titan | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: MOC·25 | Blight Titan | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Blight Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, mill two cards, then incubate X, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (Create an Incubator token with X +1/+1 counters on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每当枯萎泰坦进战场或攻击时，磨两张牌，然后抚育X，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。（派出一个上面有X个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{2}：转化此神器。」它转化为0/0非瑞人神器生物。）

trans-unit.source: Exsanguinator Cavalry

trans-unit.resname: MOC·26 | Exsanguinator Cavalry | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Knight you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的骑士对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物并派出一个血滴衍生物。（它是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: Menace
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: MOC·27 | Locthwain Lancer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken Knight you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的骑士死去时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·27 | Locthwain Lancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For years she believed persistence meant hunting for the Cauldron of Eternity. Now she knew it meant never giving up the fight against a world gone mad.
trans-unit.target: 多年来，她一直以为「毅力」是指追寻永恒鼎镬坚持不懈。如今她才明白，「毅力」是指对抗疯狂世界不言放弃。

trans-unit.source: Path of the Schemer
trans-unit.target: 阴谋家的路途

trans-unit.resname: MOC·28 | Path of the Schemer | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It's an artifact in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各磨两张牌。然后你将一张生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。它额外具有神器此类别。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·28 | Path of the Schemer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Will of the Planeswalkers — Starting with you, each player votes for planeswalk or chaos. If planeswalk gets more votes, planeswalk. If chaos gets more votes or the vote is tied, chaos ensues.
trans-unit.target: 鹏洛客议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「时空换境」或「混沌」。若时空换境票数较多，则时空换境。若混沌票数较多或两者同为最多，则引发混沌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·29 | Dance with Calamity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dance with Calamity
trans-unit.target: 灾祸同舞

trans-unit.resname: MOC·29 | Dance with Calamity | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Shuffle your library. As many times as you choose, you may exile the top card of your library. If the total mana value of the cards exiled this way is 13 or less, you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 将你的牌库洗牌。依你选择的次数，重复「你可以放逐你的牌库顶牌」此流程。如果所有以此法放逐的牌之法术力值总和等于或小于13，则你可以从这些牌之中施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·29 | Dance with Calamity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It was just another day on Innistrad.
trans-unit.target: 不过又是依尼翠稀松平常的一天。

trans-unit.target: 掩袭{3}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的掩袭费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则它获得敏捷异能，且在下个结束步骤开始时便需从战场移回其拥有者手上。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·30 | Death-Greeter's Champion | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, untap up to two target creatures your team controls. If it's a main phase, there is an additional combat phase after this phase, followed by an additional main phase.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，重置至多两个目标由你队伍操控的生物。如果是在行动阶段中，则在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段，以及接于其后之一个额外的行动阶段。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·70 | The Western Cloud | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Western Cloud
trans-unit.target: 西际狂云

trans-unit.resname: MOC·70 | The Western Cloud | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures and planeswalkers you control.
trans-unit.target: 防止将对由你操控的生物和鹏洛客造成之所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·70 | The Western Cloud | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, create three tapped Treasure tokens. They each deal 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，派出三个已横置的珍宝衍生物。它们分别对每个生物和每个鹏洛客各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·71 | The Wilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Wilds
trans-unit.target: 幻野

trans-unit.resname: MOC·71 | The Wilds | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to The Wilds and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a Food token.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入幻野和在你的维持开始时，派出一个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·71 | The Wilds | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, target player sacrifices a creature. If they do, you create a Food token. You create two Food tokens instead if the sacrificed creature's toughness was 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，目标牌手牺牲一个生物。若其如此作，则你派出一个食品衍生物。如果所牺牲生物的防御力等于或大于4，则改为你派出两个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.target: 艾紫培的天分

trans-unit.target: 所结附的鹏洛客具有「+1：派出三个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: MOC·72 | Elspeth's Talent | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of enchanted planeswalker, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你起动所结附的鹏洛客之忠诚异能时，直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+2/+2且获得警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·73 | Firemane Commando | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever another player attacks with two or more creatures, they draw a card if none of those creatures attacked you.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一位牌手以两个或更多生物攻击时，如果这些生物都没有攻击你，则其抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Enchant planeswalker Enchanted planeswalker has "−12: You get an emblem with ‘ You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant.'" Whenever you draw a card, put a loyalty counter on enchanted planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 结附于鹏洛客 所结附的鹏洛客具有「−12：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～『你可以在任意牌手的回合中，于你能够施放瞬间的时机下，起动由你操控之鹏洛客的忠诚异能。』」 每当你抓一张牌时，在所结附的鹏洛客上放置一个忠诚指示物。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first spell during each of your turns, exile the top card of target opponent's library and create a Treasure token. Then you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost if it's a spell with mana value less than the number of artifacts you control. If you don't cast it this way, you may cast it this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放自己每个回合中你的第一个咒语时，放逐目标对手的牌库顶牌并派出一个珍宝衍生物。然后如果它是法术力值小于由你操控之神器数量的咒语，则你可以施放所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未以此法施放之，则你本回合中可以施放该牌。

If it's the second time, create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying. If it's the third time, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·232 | Reverse Engineer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·232 | Reverse Engineer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Hold, an illegal research facility in a derelict merchant ship, became a wellspring of renegade intelligence.
trans-unit.target: 「要塞」这处设在废弃商船上的非法研究设施，现已成为乱匠的情报泉源。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·233 | Rise and Shine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rise and Shine
trans-unit.target: 跃动发光

trans-unit.resname: MOC·233 | Rise and Shine | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 0/0 artifact creature. Put four +1/+1 counters on each artifact that became a creature this way.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的非生物神器成为0/0神器生物。在每个以此法成为生物的神器上各放置四个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·233 | Rise and Shine | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Overload {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
trans-unit.target: 超载{4}{U}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。若你如此作，则将其叙述中的「目标」更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·234 | Saheeli's Artistry | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 选择一项或都选～

trans-unit.source: "From the first touch, I know exactly what the metal wants to be."
trans-unit.target: 「只要碰触一下，我就知道这金属想成为什么。」

trans-unit.resname: MOC·235 | Sharding Sphinx | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Whether mechanical or biological, life finds a way to propagate itself.
trans-unit.target: 不论机械生命或生体生命，都有办法繁衍。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·240 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My ancestor Toshiro used to say, 'Life is a series of choices between bad and worse.' I'm a master of making great bad choices."
trans-unit.target: 「俊郎先祖曾说，『生命是一连串的选择，每次都只有糟与更糟可选。』我最擅长选『糟』。」

trans-unit.resname: MOC·246 | Ambition's Cost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「到头来，还是第一个世界最难征服。随着我在世界之间穿行，我的力量愈发强大；无论向哪里下手，都会让下一次更为轻松。」 ～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: MOC·417 | Mystic Monastery | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: MOC·417 | Mystic Monastery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When asked how many paths reach enlightenment, the monk kicked a heap of sand. "Count," he smiled, "and then find more grains."
trans-unit.target: 「启悟之道共几何？」和尚闻言踢散跟前沙堆。「数数吧，」他微笑道，「然后找出更多沙粒。」

trans-unit.resname: MOC·418 | Path of Ancestry | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 祖灵径道

trans-unit.resname: MOC·418 | Path of Ancestry | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。当该法术力用来施放与你指挥官具共通生物类别的生物咒语时，占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·419 | Port Town | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Port Town
trans-unit.target: 港镇

trans-unit.resname: MOC·419 | Port Town | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As Port Town enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Port Town enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 于港镇进战场时，你可以从你手上展示一张平原或海岛牌。如果你未如此作，则港镇须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·419 | Port Town | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

trans-unit.resname: MOC·419 | Port Town | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A haunted fog known as the Nebelgast shrouds the cities along Nephalia's coast.
trans-unit.target: 鬼雾笼罩着涅非利亚海岸的各个城市，久久不散。

trans-unit.target: 沃原溪流

trans-unit.resname: MOC·420 | Prairie Stream | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)

trans-unit.resname: MOC·420 | Prairie Stream | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prairie Stream enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则沃原溪流须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·420 | Prairie Stream | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The continent of Ondu is a vast plateau crisscrossed by deep trenches and meandering rivers.
trans-unit.target: 昂度大陆这片广袤高原沟壑纵横，蜿流交错。

trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·421 | Rogue's Passage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.
trans-unit.target: 这谣言很快在小偷之间传开：有座无墙的迷宫，藏有价值无可计量的宝藏。

MOC·425 | Skycloud Expanse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Remote but always watching, the soaring city of Otawara moves over Kamigawa with a purpose that few understand.
trans-unit.target: 翔空城大田原虽远在九天之上，却时刻监视着神河地上的一切，其间缘由不为人知。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·426 | Spire of Industry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A beacon of prosperity to some, a shadow of oppression to others.
trans-unit.target: 有人尊其为繁荣信标，而另一些人则唾之为压迫阴影。

trans-unit.target: 在欧塔利亚，宁静与和谐已难寻见。少数例外的净土便格外值得珍惜。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·439 | Terramorphic Expanse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.
trans-unit.target: 迈开两步，向北迈进动荡将来，向南则为无宁过往，向东步回眼下此刻，或向西踏入未知境地。

trans-unit.source: "For centuries my creation kept this world in balance. Now only her shadow remains."\n—Sorin Markov

trans-unit.resname: MOC·445 | Goro-Goro and Satoru | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control that entered the battlefield this turn deal combat damage to a player, create a 5/5 red Dragon Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个本回合进战场之生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出一个5/5红色，具飞行异能的龙／精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·445 | Goro-Goro and Satoru | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: {1}{R}：由你操控的生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·446 | Katilda and Lier | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Katilda and Lier
trans-unit.target: 凯蒂妲与列尔

trans-unit.resname: MOC·446 | Katilda and Lier | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a Human spell, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放人类咒语时，目标在你坟墓场中的瞬间或法术牌获得返照异能直到回合结束。其返照费用等同于该牌的法术力费用。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放该牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）
